    • Constructor Detail

      • SeparateReceipt

        public SeparateReceipt(java.util.ArrayList<Product> listProd,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> listQ,
                       Client b,
                       User c,
                       java.lang.String pm,
                       double vp)
        This is the constructor of the class.
        name: SeparateReceipt.
        pre: the variables listProd, listQ, b, c, pm, vp, are already initialized.
        post: the attributes and relationships of the class have been initialized.
        Parameters:
        b - Is a Client object that references the client buyer of the receipt. b!=null
        c - Is a User object that references the user creator of the receipt. c!=null
        listProd - Is an ArrayList of Product that contains the list of products for the receipt. listProd!=null.
        listQ - Is an ArrayList of Integer that contains the list of quantities of products for the receipt. listQ!=null.
        pm - Is a String variable that contains the payment method of the first payment. pm equals "Efectivo", pm equals "Tarjeta de debito", pm equals "Tarjeta de credito", or pm equals "Transferencia bancaria"
        vp - Is a double variable that contains the value of the first payment.

      • addPayment

        public void addPayment(double vp,
                       java.lang.String pm,
                       User c)
        This method add a payment to the separate receipt.
        name: addPayment
        pre: The variable vp, pm, c, are already initialized.
        post: the payment has been added.
        Parameters:
        pm - Is a String variable that contains the payment method of the payment. paymentMethod equals "Efectivo", paymentMethod equals "Tarjeta de debito", paymentMethod equals "Tarjeta de credito", or paymentMethod equals "Transferencia bancaria"
        vp - Is a double variable that contains the value of the payment.
        c - Is a User object that references the user creator of the payment. c!=null

      • calculatePaymentTotal

        private double calculatePaymentTotal(Payment current,
                                     double paymentTotal)
        This method returns the payment total price of the receipt recursively.
        name: calculatePaymentTotal
        pre: The variables current, paymentTotal, are already initialized.
        post: the payment total price price has been gotten.
        Parameters:
        current - Is a Payment object that references the a payment in the linked list of payments
        paymentTotal - Is a double variable that contains the sum of the value of the payments.
        Returns:
